data.event: It gained its independence on October 1, 1953 by virtue of Executive Order No. 642 series of 1953 creating Cortes into an independent municipal or corporation.

event.title: March 19, 1954, however, that the new local government unit formally started

data.event: It was not until March 19, 1954, however, that the new local government unit formally started to function with the assumption into office of the first set of municipal officials appointed by the late President Elpedio R. Quirino.
